title: Ticket #2100: HTTP Get crashes SOAP-enabled collector
description:
Open up a web browser, connect to http://astro.cs.wisc.edu:9618

watch it crash with

Apparently this is because

ENABLE_WEB_SERVER = true

and the WEB_ROOT_DIR is nonexistant. Seems pretty harsh to assert in this case.
